channel.title: Blogs on The Astro Wolfe

item.title: Certifications
item.description: Conquering the exam. Credits The IT industry has numerous ways to break into it and get ahead in your career. One of the quickest is through IT certifications. Whether youâ€™re starting your career, expanding your expertise, or needing to comply with policies or mandates - certifications are the way to go! Many vendors offer certification, of which I highly recommend CompTIA due to being widely recognized and accepted.

item.title: Domain Shopping Sprees
item.description: It’s a guilty pleasure of mine, but I LOVE buying domains. I don’t remember when or how it all started, but it’s more addictive than PokÃ©mon - I GOTTA CLAIM ‘EM ALL! ðŸ˜‚ However, not everyone appreciates this perspective… A while back, an article hit the front page of HackerNews describing how terrible domain parking is. I’m guilty of this, but I don’t regret it. From side projects to creative domains, it’s fun to grab a good URL and throw something up there!

item.title: How I Made This Blog
item.description: Warning: You are about to read a blog post on how this blog was made - It's getting meta. Hugo: The world’s fastest framework for building websites. Credits This blog is made with Hugo. “The worldâ€™s fastest framework for building websites."1 Basically, it is a static site generator built in go. This means when it is time to build a website, it’s very fast.
